_sText:
ChopperAttack v2 - Bomb

By Nathaniel Miller AKA NIPPER
(nippermaps AT gmail.com)
maps at www.geocities.com/nipper14223

It’s a chopper and it’s attacking. So it’s
like a chopper attack!

T: Use the shadows, smoke grenades, the
chopper, and to a much lesser extent the
boat to launch your attack.

How to use the chopper a guide for all the morons:
Hit the yellow button once to start the
chopper. The chopper will not start moving until
two seconds after you hit the button. If you wish
to close the doors on the chopper do so before it
starts moving because once it starts the buttons
deactivate until the chopper reaches its
destination. If you don’t wanna get stuck I
suggest staying in the middle and standing
perfectly still. Also keep a good distance
between you and your teammates. If you
couldn’t figure all that out on your own
then you are a complete moron and I hope
you die a horrible painful death.
